alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; East Honolulu; Kona; Koolau Leeward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; South Maui, Upcountry; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 3:18PM HST until December 15 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LANAI AND PORTIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF THE REMAINING HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .Strong winds, behind a cold front now southeast of the Big Island, will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys through tonight. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Maui, Molokai, Oahu, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusts can make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
